decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall not be carried out except in complete accordance with the details shown on the submitted plans, numbers:
and shall thereafter be retained/maintained for as long as the development remains in existence.
To ensure the development complies with the provisions of the Hillingdon Local Plan: Part 2 - Development Management Policies (2020) and the London Plan (2021).

Notwithstanding the non-material amendments hereby approved, other than Condition 2, which is superseded by the above condition, all other conditions relating to Planning Permission Ref: 2297/APP/2021/2704, dated 17/09/2021, must be discharged/adhered to as per that permission.
The following plans have been superseded:
The following plans have been approved:
description:
Non-Material Amendment to planning permission ref. 2297/APP/2021/2704, dated 17-09-2021 (Extensions, remodelling and refurbishment of the existing Nursery, Infant and Junior Schools) to:
1. Replace the ground floor uninsulated low level brickwork walls to the classrooms.
2. Apply insulated render to replace the sections of existing PVC cladded areas on the first floor.
3. Alter the setting out and window fenestration design including the removal of some external doors.
4. Add an additional handrail to the roof and rooflights.
5. Add rooflights to the existing and new extension roof.
6. Install canopies to the northern elevation of the Junior School.
7. Install brise soleil to the ground and first floor.
